title: Have any inventions or scientific advances been made thanks to Mythbusters? - Quora

response.answer_text: Adam Savage has been asked this question before during a number of different public appearances (search YouTube or http://Fora.tv for 'Adam Savage').  If memory serves, there have been multiple instances where their experiments have lead to further research and/or been submitted as proofs in on-going research, but most are involved in law enforcement, military, or pure science fields which aren't necessarily public knowledge.
No. The show is about a couple of childish men blowing up a crash test dummy while a passenger in various conveyances. Just plain silly show.
